BadgeDetail.Name: Startup Agility
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge understands the key principles of the being an agile startup. They focus on delivering a working product and can iterate to deliver constant improvements and understand the key principles of the agile manifesto.

Task.Title: Startup agility
Task.Body: Upload your product backlog and your first sprint. Use the supporting resources and templates provided.
